QuestData.Title: Equine Retrieval
QuestData.Description: I like the cut of your jib, friend!$b$bI'll tell you what. The rest of the partygoers should be arriving any time now. Would you do me the honor of retrieving my favorite horse from the estate on the hill?$b$bImagine, our guests' first impression of you to be on the most regal horse in all of Tiragarde! Wondrous!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Lord Norwington's favorite horse Rose from his hilltop estate.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't believe I'm saying this, $n, but troggs are invading the estate!
